title: Breaking: UK’s inflation drops to to 4%
description: UK’s inflation rate has taken a sharp downturn, settling at 4% in November. title: Cryptocalypse imminent? TRM Labs predicts alarming rise in crypto crimes
description: Law enforcement agencies in the United States anticipate a surge in crypto-related investigations, with respondents of a survey commissioned by blockchain intelligence firm TRM Labs estimating that 40% of offenses investigated involve cryptocurrencies.
